data.persona: I hate insects! I realize their valuable place on the food chain but I think they are gross! No biting, stinging nasty creature is up to any good!
data.description:
You are in the Mud pit.
The mudpit is dark and brown. The mud inside is sticky and hard to escape. The vegetation surrounding the area is matted down.
There's a bone, a carcass, a vegetation, a mudpit, a grass, and a mud here.
The snakes and the vulture are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to steal the dead mouse from the snakes so I can bring it back to my family.
data.mid_motivation: My family will eat the mouse.
data.long_motivation: A mouse this big will feed us for a week!
